ValidationRule.description: When the case is closed, the ‘Closure Comments’ field are not filled by the User, a related error message will be shown.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration), ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Cancelled")), ISBLANK( SCC_Closure_Comments__c), RecordType.Name = 'BRI Open Case' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Harap isi diisi closure comments / komentar penutup sebelum menutup case !
